featured.text: what happens on Earth, and are responsible for quite a few legends, and that the ancient Greek and Roman gods, __(34)__ the fairies and dwarfs in many classical tales, were in fact “space people” living here.

definition.zh_def: 矮人；身材矮小的人或物
definition.en_def: A person or creature of unusually small stature; also refers to a member of a mythical race of beings in folklore.
definition.example: The dwarf in the story was known for his bravery and cleverness.
